publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1171# Mark Ballard: Fair Trade Footballs-That the Parliament notes the adverse publicity over the production, often by children, of footballs in sweatshop conditions and therefore welcomes the launch of "fairdealfootballs", fair trade footballs of "FIFA monitored international matchball" quality, and considers that the Scottish Football Association should take action to make fair trade footballs standard amongst all league and junior football clubs in Scotland. Supported by: Robin Harper*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mike Pringle*, Christine Grahame*, Nora Radcliffe*

S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Pauline McNeill*, Eleanor Scott*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Patrick Harvie*, Bill Butler*, Chris Ballance*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Shiona Baird*, Dr Jean Turner*, Johann Lamont*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, John Swinburne*, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Sarah Boyack*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Scott Barrie*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
S2M-1171# Fair Trade Footballs (lodged on 15 April 2004) Rosie Kane*
